FP Recommended Care values

Codes representing possible values for the FP Recommended Care element

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    35025007Pelvic/genital examination needed
    268607006Blood pressure screening recommended
  • Include these codes as defined in http://who.int/cg/CodeSystem/extended-content
    CodeDisplay
    Backup Method NeededBackup contraception method needed

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

description: Codes representing possible values for the FP Recommended Care element
